body.name: VEGCOO Wireless Gaming Mouse, Rechargeable Silent Wireless Mouse with 4800 DPI Adjustable,Double Click Key, Colorful RGB Lights, Computer Mice with Thumb Rest for PC/Mac Gamer (C26 Black)
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Friday, February 16 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Tuesday, February 13. Order within 18 mins
features: ▶Convenient Double-Click Key: This mouse in addition to the ordinary 7 keys, but also specifically set in the upper left corner of the double click key, can bring convenience to daily work, but also in the game to save time, improve work efficiency and the shooting rate. ★In addition, we will provide charging cable and USB in the mouse gift box.
▶Soundless Clicking Mouse: Both left and right keys are silent. Say goodbye to the annoy noises when you are working at home or plays games.
▶ Amazing Led Lights: Illuminated colorful Leds that change its color randomly create a wonderful atmosphere, making you indulge in your play, which is really a cool gaming mouse.
▶ Extended Battery Life: Built in larger 400mAh Lithium battery.It can be used for about 31 days once full recharged. Thanks to its Lithium battery, you can even use the mouse when it is recharging.

▶Widely Compatible: This RGB wireless gaming mouse is widely compatible with laptop desktop computer Chromebook and Windows 10, 8, 7, Vista, Mac OS/Linus and other systems. ★We are committed to providing high-quality products and shopping experience to all customers. We also provide 24-hour online customer service, if you have any questions, please feel free to contact us.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Rechargeable It can be charged in a variety of ways, including a power pack, a laptop, and a household charger Silent Click The mouse's left and right buttons can reach the standard of silent click, so you don't have to worry about disturbing your family when you game or work at night. Please be noted that only the left and right clicks are silent. Other buttons are not silent. Widely Compatible Windows 7/8/10 Windows XP(64) Windows Vista Mac OS X

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 11, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars VERY SMOOTH AND QUIET!!
reviews.reviewText: I wasn't too sure what to expect from a gaming mouse for working, but, I have decided I really love this mouse!! Fits great in my hand, love the "double click", love the "forward/back" buttons on the side by the thumb! At first, I couldn't figure out why the heck it felt so heavy to move around on the mouse pad... Have to take the protective stickers off the sliders! LOL!! It moves like a dream! Love the fact that I could change the DPI so easily too! The changing colors are cool but I don't really get to admire those too much. Definitely a plug and play! The charging cable works great. I gave an overnight charge to be sure it would be ready for a full day of work. I might have to update once I have worked a bit with it on the battery life.***UPDATE*** Be sure to plug the usb receiver closest to the mouse, I have found that I had to move mine around a bit to make sure there's no interference with other wireless items. It seemed like the mouse had a mind of it's own for a bit and that's what fixed the problem.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 3, 2022
reviews.reviewText: Does what I need it to do with extra features. Theres extra buttons to go forward or back in web pages. Used it for gaming a couple times. I'm not a PC gamer but I was able to hold my own in FPS games with this mouse. I think its worth it. My hand slides into the imprints nicely. So I think it's perfect for me. Would buy again if needed.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 24, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Decent, lags for a sec here and there nothing to bad
reviews.reviewText: Ya but great for the price

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 27, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I only had this mouse for three months and it completely stopped working.... worst mouse ever .... a complete waste of money

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 22, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars VEGCOO is a great brand!
reviews.reviewText: This was my first VEGCOO mouse. I have since purchased two more models. Great displays.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 27, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Best wireless mouse ive used
reviews.reviewText: I have been useing one for about a year now. I love it and when I needed another one for my computer at church it was an easy decision. Now im not a hardcore gamer but I do game some and have not had issues. I bought the black one a year ago and this time purchased the silver model. Absolutely love the feel. Money well spent.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 2, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Led are not that bright.
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. Mouse is light i like the size but only down fall was that the lights are only bright on the back emblem.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 9, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good deal for good price
reviews.reviewText: Well, not gonna lie, this mouse made me a professional gamer lol. It was fun playing with it

Wasn't my first choice, but I still use it almost a 10 months later. I was gaming about 18 hours a day for nearly 5 months. M;y hand and wrist felt no discomfort. The battery had to be charged every two days. Whenever I ran out I could still use it while it was charging. Accuracy was very good. Had a little trouble getting the right resolution at the start but once set it stays as long as the charge is kept up. In the past 6 months I have not been gaming and the mouse has held it's charge easily for more than 30 days.

reviews.reviewTitle: It was a gift, but overall looks as advertised
reviews.reviewText: Delivery was quick during this holiday season. Mouse looked good and the packaging was not damaged. I won’t be able to comment on anything else because this was a gift.

reviews.reviewTitle: Amazing gaming mouse for the price.
reviews.reviewText: I love this mouse. for the price it can't be beaten. Its more than comfortable for many hour long gaming sessions, they buttons are nice and clicky, and I love the double tap button.

Wer bei einer Maus mit einem solchen Preis etwas besonderes erwartet ist hier definitiv falsch abgebogen. Für Kinder, als "Erste Maus" ist die Maus allerdings sehr gut. Lediglich die Beleuchtung ist nicht ganz so hell wie auf den Produktbildern dargestellt, die seitlichen Streifen sind recht dunkel und unspektakulär. Aber nochmal, für den Preis (für eine Wireless Maus) darf man wirklich nicht mehr erwarten. Meine Erwartungen wurden jedoch übergriffen.
La batería dura poco y no se sabe cuando se agota
